translated: Amedeo Modigliani was born July 12, 1884 in Livorno, Italy, died January 24, 1920 in Paris, was an Italian painter and sculptor attached to the School of Paris.
original: Amedeo Modigliani, né le 12 juillet 1884 à Livourne, Italie, mort le 24 janvier 1920 à Paris, est un peintre et sculpteur italien rattaché à l'École de Paris.
